title: Function of NO in mechanism of ozone destruction

content.prompt:
Step 1: NO(g) + O3(g) → NO2(g) + O2(g)

Step 2: NO2(g) + O(g) → NO(g) + O2(g)

A reaction mechanism for the destruction of ozone, O3(g), is represented above. In the overall reaction, NO(g) is best described as

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
